AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: reformed degenerate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a filthy degenerate, who would do anything for skooma, even commit murder. While committing a heinous crime [PAWN_possessive] life was almost lost.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was saved in an act of unexpected kindness. Afterwards, [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to commit [PAWN_possessive]self to one goal. The protection of the Dunmeri people from a hellish abomination.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: false Nerevarine
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was lead to believe that [PAWN_pronoun] was Nerevarine reborn by a local Blades agent. This turned out to not be the case, but [PAWN_pronoun] still believed. The locals of Sadrith Mora came to call [PAWN_nameDef] 'The Deranged', as [PAWN_pronoun] would constantly spout off about how [PAWN_pronoun] was going to save Morrowind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Telvanni Mouth
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Once a disgraced member of the Mages Guild, [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited by an up-and-coming member of Great House Telvanni, quickly rising to the rank of Mouth. [PAWN_possessive] skills, and general lack of care for the concept of ownership, proved highly useful for the soon-to-be Archmagister.\n\nThough, eventually [PAWN_nameDef] decided to move on in life, and pursue other desires.
